attributes.action: Say yes to GE Hitachi's new IFR Nuclear reactor
attributes.additional_details:
In December GE Hitachi (GEH) offered to build a IFR fast nuclear reactor within five years which could use up the waste plutonium at Sellafield, and if it doesn’t work, the UK won’t have to pay.

The UK is progressing too slowly in cutting CO2 emissions and Nuclear power is the only sensible answer. IFR reactors are more efficient, and safer, they simply can't melt down.

If you truly believe in protecting the environment you must support new developments in safe nuclear power.
